app.title: VaultPad
app.subtitle: Encrypted data vault
init.dbHint: Choose a location for your encrypted database. All data is stored locally in an encrypted file. You can move or copy it to another device.
masterPassword.setup.title: Set Master Password
masterPassword.setup.hint: Your master password encrypts all data. It never leaves your device and is not stored on any server. If you lose it, your data cannot be recovered. Recommended: 12+ characters.
masterPassword.setup.label: Master Password
masterPassword.validation.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
unlock.hint: Enter your master password to decrypt data
unlock.label: Master Password
sidebar.title: Projects
content.placeholder: Select a project or create a new one
content.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
newProject.title: New Project
newProject.hint: A project is a separate block of encrypted information. The name and content are encrypted with your master password.
newProject.customPassword: Use custom password for this project
newProject.customPasswordHint: This project will be encrypted with a separate password instead of the master password. You will need this exact password to decrypt it.
newProject.validation.customMinLength: Custom password must be at least 8 characters
editProject.title: Edit Project
editProject.switchToMaster: Project will be re-encrypted with the master password
editProject.keepCurrentPassword: Leave empty to keep current password
editProject.passwordWillChange: Password will be changed upon save
customPassword.title: Custom Password Required
customPassword.description: Project "{{name}}" is encrypted with a custom password.
settings.title: Settings
login.hint: This is your server account password (for authentication only). It is separate from your master password used for encryption. Your encryption keys never leave this device.
deleteProject.title: Delete Project
deleteProject.warning: This action cannot be undone. All encrypted data for this project will be permanently deleted.
pin.setup.title: Set PIN Code
pin.setup.hint: Set a PIN code for quick access. The PIN is used to unlock the app instead of entering the full master password each time.
pin.setup.label: PIN Code (4 digits)
pin.unlock.title: Enter PIN
pin.unlock.hint: Enter your PIN code to unlock
settings.clearSessionHint: Remove saved credentials from keychain. Next launch will require full setup.
settings.clearSessionConfirm: Are you sure? You will need to select the database and enter the master password again.
settings.removePinConfirm: Remove PIN? You will go directly to the main screen on next launch without PIN verification.
